amendment.description: To provide that the funds made available for a transmission study on the placement of 500 megawatt wind energy in North Dakota and South Dakota shall be nonreimbursable.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1697 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1697 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Dorgan. (consideration: CR S11539-11544; text: CR S11540) To provide that the funds made available for a transmission study on the placement of 500 megawatt wind energy in North Dakota and South Dakota shall be nonreimbursable.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1697 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1697 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Dorgan.
